text: Jo's Boys, and How They Turned Out: A Sequel to "Little Men" is a book by Louisa May Alcott. It was published in 1886. It tells of what happened to the children at Plumfield as they grew to adulthood. ==Other websites== *Jo's Boys on Project Gutenberg Category:1886 books Category:Books by Louisa May Alcott Category:American children's books
title: Jo's Boys
